attributes.action: Keep the Olympic Stadium public for future generations of athletes
attributes.additional_details:
Following the recent success of British athletes, I call on Mr Cameron and the Government to ensure the Olympic Stadium remains in Public Ownership for the benefit of future generations of athletes.

With the success of Jessica Ennis, Mo Farah and Greg Rutherford, surely we need to retain this wonderful stadium, to enable our children to benefit from this fantastic legacy. With such success we cannot let this opportunity for our children be turned into a stadium which will never see such amazing events again.
